medical_history.chief_complaint: Mid abdominal pain that has progressively worsened and is now located in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has had abdominal pain since ___, which has worsened over time and is now crampy and constant. He experienced low-grade fever this morning.
